attributes.additional_details:
Offering  'None of the above' & 'Candidates don't represent me' options will ensure all voices are heard
People fought for this democracy so lets make it work
A fine could be imposed as is done in Australia for non attendance.
attributes.background:
It is time for our Government to make Voting compulsory for all eligible voters (unless there is a good medical/other reason for not doing so).
Too many people believe that our system is failing democracy so lets fix it.
